div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2034 Ascoli Piceno (anc. Asculum), Pice- (70) num, 1883 Burial: late 3rd cent. B.C. (Crawford) Contents: 87 AR. Pot hoard Cales: 4 st. Neapolis: 21 st. Campano-Tarentine: 4 st. Roman Rep.: 10 st. (ROMANO; ROMA) 48 quadrig. Disposition: Silveri-Gentiloni 25 Helbig, BullInst 1884, p. 140 Le Gentilhomme, RN 1934, pp. 3-4 Thomsen, ERC I, p. 101 Crawford, RRCH 59
